<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Accountant

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
The OpportunityAt 49 Financial, precision in financial reporting is not just a requirement—it's a cornerstone of our success. As we continue to grow, the role of Senior Accountant becomes increasingly vital. We're looking for a meticulous and dedicated professional who thrives on ensuring accuracy and fostering trust through financial integrity.
Why This Role MattersAs a Senior Accountant, you will be instrumental in maintaining the financial health of our company. Your detailed focus and rigorous approach to financial management ensure that every financial transaction reflects our commitment to excellence and supports our operational success.
Your ImpactFinancial Documentation and Reporting: Review and verify all source documentation, ensuring accurate revenue calculations and timely financial reporting.Accounts Management: Oversee accounts payable and receivable; perform regular account reconciliations and manage overdue accounts effectively.Team Leadership and Process Improvement: Partner with accounting staff, refine business processes, and strengthen internal controls to enhance financial accuracy and efficiency.Strategic Financial Support: Contribute to company strategies with precise financial data and insights, ensuring alignment with our financial objectives and forecasts.
What We’re Looking ForA detail-oriented individual with a Bachelor’s degree in Accounting and a minimum of 2-5 years of relevant experience.Proficient in Excel, including XLOOKUPs and pivot tables, and familiar with QuickBooks, Salesforce, and Paycom.Thorough understanding of GAAP and experience in the financial services industry is preferred.Relevant certifications (CPA or CMA) are highly valued.Exceptional analytical, organizational, and communication skills, with a proven ability to handle high-volume transactions and complex financial data.
Join Us: If you are ready to contribute to a team that values things like teamwork, gratitude, excellence, and authenticity over the more traditional approach, we could be a great fit. At 49 Financial, you’ll not only contribute to our growth but also become part of a company that is shaping the future of financial services. Learn more about us at 49Financial.com.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
